price: Say, “If there were other gods besides Him – as they claim – they would have surely sought a way to the Lord of the Throne[39].”
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [39] To please Him or take over His Throne.
